course_name: Sustainable Development in the Resources Sector
school: Mech & Mine Engineering School, Sustainable Minerals Institute
description: An introductory course about Sustainable Development (SD) as it relates to the resources sector. The course covers SD history and theory, drivers to adopt SD principles in the resources sector, industry responses to SD, SD in varied operational settings, including small and mid-tier mining companies, assessment and measurement of SD initiatives at mine operations. Assumed Background: Students are assumed to have a basic knowledge of the nature of the modern resources sector and its operations.
